snippet: The House wastes time passing legislation designed to satisfy the ideological desires of conservative voters while the bills that need to become law get blocked.
abstract: Editorial criticizes House Republicans for wasting time passing legislation designed to satisfy the ideological desires of conservative voters while blocking bills that need to become law; contends that their actions show that they have little interest in governing.
lead_paragraph: The House wastes time passing legislation designed to satisfy the ideological desires of conservative voters while the bills that need to become law get blocked.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
